data.oai_dc:dc: Occurrence|Specimen|Megascelinae, Ectyphinae, Syllegomydinae, Rhopaliinae, Afrotropical, Mydidae, Leptomydinae

Occurrence data of 2,165 Afrotropical Mydidae (Insecta: Diptera) specimens representing 208 species based on specimens studied in numerous natural history collections. Data gathered for chapter on Mydidae in the Manual of Afrotropical Diptera.|The occurrence data are made available as a unique data-set in order to facilitate study of Afrotropical Mydidae (mydas flies).|1,885 occurrences
